code: import axios from"axios";var api=axios.create({baseURL:"https://api.themoviedb.org/3/",params:{api_key:"10923b261ba94d897ac6b81148314a3f",language:"en-US"}});export var movieApi={nowPlaying:function nowPlaying(){var page=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:1;return api.get("movie/now_playing",{params:{page:page}});},upComing:function upComing(){var page=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:1;return api.get("movie/upcoming",{params:{page:page}});},popular:function popular(){var page=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:1;return api.get("movie/popular",{params:{page:page}});},movieDetail:function movieDetail(id){return api.get("movie/".concat(id),{params:{append_to_response:"videos"}});},search:function search(term){var page=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:1;return api.get("search/movie",{params:{query:encodeURIComponent(term),page:page}});},getCasts:function getCasts(id){return api.get("movie/".concat(id,"/credits"));},getCastDetail:function getCastDetail(person_id){return api.get("person/".concat(person_id));},getSimilarMovies:function getSimilarMovies(movie_id){var page=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:1;return api.get("movie/".concat(movie_id,"/similar"),{params:{page:page}});}};export var tvApi={popular:function popular(){var page=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:1;return api.get("tv/popular",{params:{page:page}});},topRated:function topRated(){var page=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:1;return api.get("tv/top_rated",{params:{page:page}});},airingToday:function airingToday(){var page=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:1;return api.get("tv/airing_today",{params:{page:page}});},showDetail:function showDetail(id){return api.get("tv/".concat(id),{params:{append_to_response:"videos"}});},search:function search(term){var page=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:1;return api.get("search/tv",{params:{query:encodeURIComponent(term),page:page}});},getCasts:function getCasts(id){return api.get("tv/".concat(id,"/credits"));},getCastDetail:function getCastDetail(person_id){return api.get("person/".concat(person_id));}};
